document.infon: A fun title for a paper

passage.text: The HOX1-MLL2 fusion gene is a tumor suppressor in colorectal cancer. The HER2-neu gene is a tumor suppressor in skin cancer. The HER2/neu gene is a tumor suppressor in glioblastoma. mir-1 is a tumor suppressor in lung cancer. mir-5 is a tumor suppressor in non-small-cell lung carcinoma (NSCLC). HER2 (ERBB2) is a tumor suppressor in pancreatic cancer. EGFR is a tumor suppressor in null cell acute lymphoblastic leukaemia (NCALL).
